name: Kinki Restaurant + Bar - Japanese Fusion @ Customs House

reviews.text:
The Wagyu and foie gras Donburi was an absolute flavour bomb! The richness of the foie gras emulsified beautifully with the egg yolk, creating a fragrant sauce that coated the incredibly tender Wagyu perfectly. The portion was so generous, it comfortably kept me full right through dinner â€“ a testament to its satisfying size.

While the culinary experience was top-notch, there was a slightly alarming moment when a nearby diner's metal chair unexpectedly broke. Thankfully, the manager handled the situation with impressive professionalism. A quick tip for expectant mothers: perhaps request one of the wooden support chairs for added peace of mind.

Despite this minor incident, the exceptional view truly elevated the entire dining experience. Overall, this restaurant hits all the right notes of a top-tier establishment, delivering on flavour, portion size, and ambiance.

Had a wonderful dining experience! The food was delicious, the atmosphere was warm and inviting, and the view made it even more special. Big thanks to Mr. Prem for the excellent service â€” very attentive and professional, knowing that we are celebrating our anniversary, he specially wrote a note and served us complimentary champagne. Highly recommended for a relaxing and enjoyable evening!

The meal was delicious from start to finish. The 2 key dishes were the salmon with breadcrumb and the wagyu appetiser. They were both cook to perfection and the wagyu had a very unique blend of flavours that matches each other really well. All in all the food was really enjoyable and Vivian made our whole dining experience even more enjoyable. We were a very big group and she mange everything really well.

She was attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu. Her recommendations were spot-on, and she checked in at the perfect times without being intrusive.

Had a great date night at Kinki! Food was awesome, drinks were amazing & notably outstanding service from Jay! Thanks Jay for the attention to detail, great recommendations & for welcoming us into the space ðŸ¤©

We totally enjoyed the dinning experience at Kinki with the awesome and fantastic recommendation by Prem! Enjoyed the food he recommend, it was spot on! Everything was so delicious and thanks for the special and not on the menu cocktail that specially made for us! A must try when you are here!
